comment.author: 13423385@N03
comment._content: A Dambo not a Sambo... a dambo is an area of open grassland

comment.author: 59356674@N05
comment._content: It's actually 'wetland' - a marshy patch where tobacco seeds were germinated before transplanting

comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: I think it's Chawa, not Lkawa.  A dambo is a natural feature, though it may be taken advantage of in tobacco farming.
